entry.title: DFDL WG - document #315: Implementation note needed for the delimited scanner feature of the DFDL parser
entry.content:
• Status changed from submitted to accepted

Section 12.3.2.2 to be updated to include an implementation note which covers the implications for the delimiter scanner if an implementation supports the optional features referenced above.
